data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Goal! Edigar Junio gives Yokohama Marinos a 1-0 lead.
Goal! Dyanfrez Douglas equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 11, Andres Iniesta converts the penalty to give Kobe a 1-2 lead.
Kobe have been given a penalty...
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Yokohama Marinos takes a corner from the left.
Kobe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Marcos Junior's header is off-target for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 19, Jumpei Iida awards Kobe a goal kick.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daigo Nishi.
In the minute 22, Daigo Nishi is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick Kobe.
Kobe are caught offside.
In the minute 28, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Kobe at Nissan Stadium.
Kota Watanabe of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Edigar Junio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 37, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 39, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Shinnosuke Hatanaka is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 42, Jumpei Iida has awarded Yokohama Marinos a corner.
Yokohama Marinos takes a corner from the right.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 44, Jumpei Iida has awarded Yokohama Marinos a corner.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Edigar Junio gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Kobe defence.
In the minute 45, Jumpei Iida signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kobe's half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kobe.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Takuya Yasui is on a sub for Sergi Samper for Kobe.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 48, In Yokohama, Kobe push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 48, Kobe have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 51, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kobe throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 55, Jumpei Iida awards Kobe a goal kick.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Kyogo Furuhashi puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
In the minute 57, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kobe's area.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Edigar Junio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 62, Theerathon Bunmathan of Yokohama Marinos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yokohama Marinos's Edigar Junio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Kobe at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 63, Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos has been booked by Jumpei Iida and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first substitution, with Junior Santos replacing Erik.
Ado Onaiwu is replacing Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
The home team have replaced Edigar Junio with Daizen Maeda. This is the third substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Ado Onaiwu's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kobe at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 68, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 73, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kobe's area.
The away team replace Yuta Goke with Keijiro Ogawa.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos's Ado Onaiwu is caught offside.
In the minute 76, Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jumpei Iida blows against Kobe's Keijiro Ogawa for offside.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Jumpei Iida awards Kobe a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Kobe defence as Ado Onaiwu fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 84, Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 85, Ange Postecoglou is making the team's fourth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Yuki Otsu replacing Takuya Wada.
The home team have replaced Kota Watanabe with Kota Mizunuma. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 86, Ryuho Kikuchi is replacing Daigo Nishi for the away team.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Nissan Stadium.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Yokohama Marinos's Yuki Otsu gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kobe.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kobe make their fourth substitution with Noriaki Fujimoto replacing Dyanfrez Douglas.
Goal! Yokohama Marinos reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Ryuta Koike.
Theerathon Bunmathan (Yokohama Marinos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
